author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE BERYL PULLING AWAY FROM JAMAICA... ...EXPECTED TO PASS JUST SOUTH OF THE CAYMAN ISLANDS OVERNIGHT...
summary:
...CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE BERYL PULLING AWAY FROM JAMAICA... ...EXPECTED TO PASS JUST SOUTH OF THE CAYMAN ISLANDS OVERNIGHT...
 As of 11:00 PM EDT Wed Jul 3
 the center of Beryl was located near 18.0, -79.2
 with movement WNW at 21 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 961 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 130 mph.
